Question
========
What is the SI unit of linear momentum?

Answerlist
----------
* $\mathsf{kg\,m/s}$
* $\mathsf{kg\,m/s^2}$
* $\mathsf{N\,s}$
* $\mathsf{N\,m}$
* $\mathsf{J\,s}$

Solution
========
The kilogram metre per second ($\mathsf{kg\,m/s}$) is the SI unit of momentum.
